backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file listing implemented features, related source files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell containing the root div and script entry for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component managing navigation between the orders list and add-order flow within a provider context.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmDialog.ts: Reusable confirmation dialog built on AlertDialog, exposing customizable title, description, and confirm actions.
frontend/src/features/add-order/AddOrder: Coordinator for the multi-step add-order process including capture/upload, preview, OCR review, and navigation handling.
frontend/src/features/add-order/CameraCa: Camera interface using useCamera to start video, capture photos, switch cameras, and handle browser support errors.
frontend/src/features/add-order/ImagePre: Displays a preview of the captured or uploaded image with options to retake or proceed to OCR review.
frontend/src/features/add-order/OcrRevie: Processes an uploaded image with mock OCR, allows manual correction of customer and street fields, and saves a new order.
frontend/src/features/add-order/PhotoUpl: Provides a UI to select and upload an image file, forwarding the selected photo to a parent handler.
frontend/src/features/ocr/ocr.ts: Simulates OCR by emitting progress updates and returning an empty string to trigger manual entry.
frontend/src/features/ocr/parse.ts: Parses OCR text to extract customer name and street using regex patterns with fallback to line positions.
frontend/src/features/orders/grouping.ts: Groups orders by street or customer, returning sorted group structures.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrderItem.t: Renders a single order with controls to toggle completion and delete it via confirmation.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrdersOverv: Displays grouped orders with expand/collapse sections, filtering, stats, and an option to clear all orders.
frontend/src/features/orders/OrdersProvi: Manages order state with add, delete, toggle, and clear operations while persisting to local storage.
frontend/src/features/orders/storage.ts: Loads, saves, and clears orders from local storage using a fixed key.
frontend/src/features/orders/types.ts: Defines order and grouping interfaces for customer and street organization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module noting that no backend queries are needed due to local storage use.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a full set of OKLCH CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended OKLCH-based color system, custom animations, and typography/container/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's state and features for an Android courier app, outlining OCR-based order capture, local storage, and grouped order viewing.
